u-NFzAT42vld2pcwQ.name: Transactions & dividends #beta
u-NFzAT42vld2pcwQ.author: Rafal <CEzOZ77nYhZX6L0qXPKXSs6GBho2>
u-NFzAT42vld2pcwQ.info:
To import your stock transactions from XTB (CFDs or shorts are not supported yet):

1. Go to [xStation](https://xstation5.xtb.com/)
2. Open **Account History/Historia** → **Cash operations/Operacje gotówkowe** 
3. Choose timeframe
4. Click **Export/Eksportuj** → **Excel** and download it
5. Open or drop that file here

stmts.md: Transactions are spread on multiple rows, we need to collect all the info
Old type of transaction - we take the quantity here
